subject: Basketball (College)
lead_paragraph: Anthony Gill scored 16 points, Malcolm Brogdon had 13, and No. 6 Virginia bounced back from its first loss of the season with an 82-57 victory over Bradley.
snippet: Anthony Gill scored 16 points, Malcolm Brogdon had 13, and No. 6 Virginia bounced back from its first loss of the season with an 82-57 victory over Bradley.
